name: Milk-powder, Treason and plot!
description:
Your fed up on Santa's free slave labor he gets from you!

You want to fight back!!!

As an elf you engineered a candy cane that can fly to fight against your new mortal enemy, you also decided to destroy Santa sled, but you didn't know he could fly!!

Take to the skys and plot to kill Santa once an for all, you only got one shot.

Game made for Three Things Games - By team Milk
